Summary: Very bright white light zipping through the sky, abruptly changed direction then dissappeared. No clouds were in the sky that night.
divs: sighting detailsvery bright white light zipping through the sky, abruptly changed direction then dissappeared. no clouds were in the sky that night. 1. i was in sterling heights area, just turned down my street with my convertible top down. 2. when i laid my head back on the seat\head rest i saw a very bright white light. 3. at first i thought it was a shooting star, but noticed it was in our atmosphere and not in space. 4. the object was moving north east then suddenly changed to north west and about roughly 4 seconds later it disappeared without a trace. there were no clouds in the sky, no helicopters no planes. i did notice a lot of people in the area claiming they saw some lights in the sky that night as well.
